title: I just love when the enemy Diamond solo laner is matched to lane against our Silver
body: Diamond vs Silver in a solo lane? Are you serious RIOT? It is bad enough if they are in one of the 2 bot roles, that at least is somewhat manageable, especially if their lane partner is not as good as them, but a solo lane with that much level gap is insanely one-sided. You likely just gave the diamond player a free lane unless the Silver's Jungler camps their ass, which is not really helpful to any other lanes who might need a gank or 2 as well. If you are gonna have a diamond player on a team, please try to place them against a platinum at least (another diamond is preferred though).

replies.body: You could just laneswap if it bothers ya.
The team MMRs' are the same, so in the end they just suck really bad.
While true sometimes, according to OP.GG, the team's avg MMR difference was around 300. Sooo
It's ok. Diamonds don't try hard in normals anyways.
If its normals then its fair.
